About

Who We Are

Meal Outpost is a restaurant DAO (decentralized autonomous organization) that incubates, licenses, and operates virtual restaurants. Meal Outpost harnesses the creativity and talent of food entrepreneurs and combines it with the working power of independent restaurant owners. Restaurant owners (Outposts) select and operate virtual brands at their restaurants from our catalog of brands, and then remit a royalty fee to Meal Outpost based on sales. We use this royalty to:

  • Pay our licensed brand partners
  • Burn the $Meal token to increase its value and to airdrop rewards to our NFT Holders and consumers
  • Help food entrepreneurs and influencers create new brands
  • Purchase traditional brick-and-mortar restaurant brands to add to our catalog

Think of Meal Outpost and its $Meal token as a restaurant ETF; instead of investing in one particular brand, you are investing in the constellation of brands that operate on our platform. A percentage of profits from every purchase goes directly to purchasing the $Meal token, increasing its value. As consumers purchase, we send the owners of the brand royalties and also $Meal tokens as rewards. As an Outpost works to prepare food and serve the chosen brands' offerings, we remit instant payment and $Meal tokens as rewards. As consumers purchase and write reviews for brands, they also receive $Meal tokens.

It's all about reciprocity. Each participant is incentivized to act in their own interests, which positively affects the group.

Why

If you want to start a restaurant you have two choices: start it yourself, or get a franchise. Starting yourself means you face a stark reality: nearly 90% of restaurants fail. Getting a franchise is safer, but also means most of your revenue is split between middlemen and corporations, leaving the franchisee not as an owner but an employee of the brand. (On average, making $82,000 a year.)

We believe restaurant operators need four major tools in the post-pandemic economy:

  1. Access to virtual brands which only live in digital apps.
  2. Raw ingredients and last mile economies of scale.
  3. Complete kitchen monetization and utilization.
  4. Marketing support

We believe restaurant brands need three major tools:

  1. A path to scale without having to pay the costs to franchise.
  2. Stability in Labor
  3. Marketing support

Meal Outpost DAO provides these tools for restaurants and brands built collectively to ensure reciprocity. Learn more about the economics for restaurants and brands in the Discord.

Wanna learn more? Join the Discord

Roadmap

NFT Membership Levels

To fund our operations, we are launching the Meal Outpost Loyalty NFT Card. One loyalty card to access all of the discounts, airdrops, and rewards from all of our restaurant partners. Check out the benefits and join the discord to be the first to gain access to the drop on OpenSea.

Mis-en-Place

  • Right to purchase the $Meal coin in the pre-sell round.
  • Governance rights via Membership NFT
  • Access and discounts for all restaurants on the platform
  • More to come!

Chef’s Table

  • All of the Mis-en-Place benefits
  • 4x governance rights via Membership NFT
  • Exclusive access to celebrity chef events across the world
  • The right to open an Outpost “franchise” in your city using our licensed brands.

(More to come!)

FAQ

What's the value of independent operators joining a community?

Scale. We can go to suppliers, delivery service providers (DSP), and negotiate better rates. Large companies are paying DSP 12-17% for delivery while independent restaurants are paying 25-30%. Why? Because they don’t have power within the ecosystem, it is all slanted towards the big franchise corporations.

Whats the value of the food creator or brand joining a collective?

Support. When you start a new business you don’t know what you don’t know. Designing menus, logos, finding suppliers, is time consuming and expensive. A collective will help you leap frog over hurdles and give feedback on whether your idea is likely to succeed at scale or not.
